column1: #text=I went to the library to find books about making a set of wooden shelves .
#text=I asked the librarian for help and she pointed me towards the right section .
#text=I looked at all the books on woodworking until I found a few that I felt had the information I needed to build the shelves .
#text=I took the books that I needed to the librarian and she told me that they now have a self-checkout .
#text=She showed me how the system worked and assigned me a pin code .
#text=They gave me a new library card that will let me use the self check out .
#text=So I scanned my library card and put in my pass code .
#text=I scanned each of the books i had chosen and then clicked on the button to print my receipt .
#text=This new system will make going to the library much faster .
#text=I gathered my books and left the library and went home to start my book shelves .
